data.actual_result: The second line is slightly indented more to the right than the first line
data.expected_result: Both lines start at the same spot like on desktop
data.short_description: Actions that have a second line in the audit log (giving roles, granting permissions) aren't lined up
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can view the audit log and either manage channels or roles - Add a role to a user, or edit channel overrides, anything that will show a subaction in the audit log - Go into the audit log and expand that entry - Observe the beginning of the action line, and the beginning of the action information line (what action was done, and the specific info for the action)
